class.name: WeakCache
class.javadoc:
A hashtable-based cache with weak keys and weak values. An entry in the map will be automatically removed when its key is no longer in the ordinary use. A value will be automatically removed as well when it is no longer in the ordinary use.
1.7
Sergey A. Malenkov

Returns a value to which the specified {@code key} is mapped, or {@code null} if this map contains no mapping for the {@code key}.
key the key whose associated value is returned
a value to which the specified {@code key} is mapped

Associates the specified {@code value} with the specified {@code key}. Removes the mapping for the specified {@code key} from this cache if it is present and the specified {@code value} is {@code null}. If the cache previously contained a mapping for the {@code key}, the old value is replaced by the specified {@code value}.
key the key with which the specified value is associated
value the value to be associated with the specified key
Removes all of the mappings from this cache.
